semantic_description: Add OpenTelemetry RabbitMQ client instrumentation and key span attributes so that RabbitMQ publish/consume operations appear in Jaeger traces.

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.destination
attributes_to_add.value_source: the variable 'exchangeName' or queue name used when publishing/consuming

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.rabbitmq.routing_key
attributes_to_add.value_source: the variable 'routingKey' supplied to the publish call

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.conversation_id
attributes_to_add.value_source: the message header value of 'CorrelationToken' from RequestEvents
